verses.verse: And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

If any <S%H5315>one<s%> <S%H2398>sin<s%>, and <S%H4603>commit<s%> a <S%H4604>trespass<s%> against <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and deal <S%H3584>falsely<s%> with his <S%H5997>neighbor<s%> in a matter of <S%H6487>deposit<s%>, or of <S%H8667>bargain<s%>, or of <S%H1498>robbery<s%>, or have <S%H6231>oppressed<s%> his <S%H5997>neighbor<s%>,

or have <S%H4672>found<s%> that which was <S%H9>lost<s%>, and deal <S%H8267>falsely<s%> <S%H7650>therein<s%>, and swear to a <S%H8267>lie<s%>; in <S%H259>any<s%> of all these things that a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6213>doeth<s%>, <S%H2398>sinning<s%> <S%H2007>therein<s%>;

then it shall <S%H2398>be<s%>, if he hath sinned, and is <S%H816>guilty<s%>, that he shall <S%H7725>restore<s%> <S%H1500>that<s%> which he took by <S%H1497>robbery<s%>, or the <S%H6233>thing<s%> which he hath <S%H6231>gotten<s%> by <S%H6487>oppression<s%>, or the deposit which was <S%H6485>committed<s%> to <S%H9>him<s%>, or the lost thing which he <S%H4672>found<s%>,

or any thing about which he hath <S%H7650>sworn<s%> <S%H8267>falsely<s%>; he shall even <S%H7999>restore<s%> it in <S%H7218>full<s%>, and shall <S%H3254>add<s%> the fifth <S%H2549>part<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H5414>thereto<s%>: unto him to whom it appertaineth shall he give <S%H3117>it<s%>, in the day of his being found <S%H819>guilty<s%>.

And he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> his <S%H817>trespass-offering<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, a <S%H352>ram<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> out of the <S%H6629>flock<s%>, according to thy <S%H6187>estimation<s%>, for a <S%H817>trespass-offering<s%>, unto the <S%H3548>priest<s%>:

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and he shall be <S%H5545>forgiven<s%> concerning <S%H259>whatsoever<s%> he <S%H6213>doeth<s%> so as to be guilty <S%H819>thereby<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, This is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>: the <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> shall be on the <S%H4169>hearth<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> all <S%H3915>night<s%> unto the <S%H1242>morning<s%>; and the <S%H784>fire<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> shall be kept burning <S%H3344>thereon<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3847>put<s%> on his <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H4055>garment<s%>, and his <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H4370>breeches<s%> shall he <S%H3847>put<s%> upon his <S%H1320>flesh<s%>; and he shall take <S%H7311>up<s%> the <S%H1880>ashes<s%> whereto the <S%H784>fire<s%> hath <S%H398>consumed<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and he shall <S%H7760>put<s%> them <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%>.

And he shall put <S%H6584>off<s%> his <S%H899>garments<s%>, and put <S%H3847>on<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%>, and carry <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H1880>ashes<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> unto a <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>.

And the <S%H784>fire<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> shall be kept <S%H3344>burning<s%> <S%H3518>thereon<s%>, it shall not go out; and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H1197>burn<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> on it every <S%H1242>morning<s%>: and he shall lay the <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> in <S%H6186>order<s%> upon <S%H6999>it<s%>, and shall burn thereon the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the <S%H8002>peace-offerings<s%>.
Fire <S%H784><s%> shall be kept <S%H3344>burning<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%>; it shall not go <S%H3518>out<s%>.

And this is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%>: the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%>.

And he shall <S%H7311>take<s%> up therefrom his <S%H7062>handful<s%>, of the fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> of the <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%>, and of the <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H3828>thereof<s%>, and all the frankincense which is upon the <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%>, and shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> it upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%>, as the <S%H234>memorial<s%> <S%H3068>thereof<s%>, unto Jehovah.

And that which is <S%H3498>left<s%> thereof shall <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%>: it shall be <S%H398>eaten<s%> without <S%H4682>leaven<s%> in a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>; in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> they shall eat <S%H398>it<s%>.

It shall not be <S%H644>baken<s%> with <S%H2557>leaven<s%>. I have <S%H5414>given<s%> it as their <S%H2506>portion<s%> of my offerings made by <S%H801>fire<s%>; it is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%>, as the <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>, and as the <S%H817>trespass-offering<s%>.

Every <S%H2145>male<s%> among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of <S%H2706>it<s%>, as his portion for <S%H5769>ever<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%>, from the <S%H801>offerings<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> made by <S%H801>fire<s%>: whosoever <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> them shall be <S%H6942>holy<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

This is the <S%H7133>oblation<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and of his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, which they shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when he is <S%H4886>anointed<s%>: the tenth <S%H6224>part<s%> of an <S%H374>ephah<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> for a <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> <S%H8548>perpetually<s%>, <S%H4276>half<s%> of it in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and <S%H4276>half<s%> thereof in the <S%H6153>evening<s%>.

On a <S%H4227>baking-pan<s%> it shall be <S%H6213>made<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>; when it is <S%H7246>soaked<s%>, thou shalt <S%H935>bring<s%> it <S%H7246>in<s%>: in baken <S%H6595>pieces<s%> shalt thou <S%H7126>offer<s%> the <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And the <S%H4899>anointed<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> that shall be in his stead from among his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H2706>it<s%>: by a statute for <S%H5769>ever<s%> it shall be <S%H3632>wholly<s%> <S%H6999>burnt<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
And every <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> of the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall be wholly <S%H3632>burnt<s%>: it shall not be <S%H398>eaten<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, This is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>: in the <S%H4725>place<s%> where the <S%H2403>burnt-offering<s%> is <S%H7819>killed<s%> shall the <S%H5930>sin-offering<s%> be <S%H7819>killed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: it is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%>.

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> that offereth it for <S%H2398>sin<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H6918>it<s%>: in a holy <S%H4725>place<s%> shall it be <S%H398>eaten<s%>, in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>.

Whatsoever shall <S%H5060>touch<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> thereof shall be <S%H6942>holy<s%>; and when there is <S%H5137>sprinkled<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> thereof upon any <S%H899>garment<s%>, thou shalt <S%H3526>wash<s%> that whereon it was <S%H5137>sprinkled<s%> in a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>.

But the <S%H2789>earthen<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%> wherein it is <S%H1310>boiled<s%> shall be <S%H7665>broken<s%>; and if it be <S%H1310>boiled<s%> in a <S%H5178>brazen<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%>, it shall be <S%H4838>scoured<s%>, and <S%H7857>rinsed<s%> in <S%H4325>water<s%>.
Every <S%H2145>male<s%> among the <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H6944>thereof<s%>: it is most <S%H6944>holy<s%>.

And no <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>, whereof any of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> is <S%H935>brought<s%> into the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> to make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H398>place<s%>, shall be eaten: it shall be <S%H8313>burnt<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>.
